page.title: 18Recreation in W.Basssett
page.content:
Wootton Bassett lake is a popular place for{fishing.}Lots of people enjoy fishing there for Roach,Tench and Pike. Although this is out of our zone it is still very popular.
The{Sports Centre}is to the North of our region. It has five facilities Squash,Table Tennis,Tennis Courts, Badminton and Swimming. Many go there.
There are many{footpaths}scattered all over Wootton Bassett, some near the Railway Station.A lot of families take their dogs for walks as a pastime.
Wootton Bassett{Library}is full of books for all ages.Lots of people in the town are members. It has fiction and non-fiction and lots of other books.
